member.name: WinRT.InitializeXamlDiagnosticsEx
member.summary: Initializes a Xaml Diagnostics session. This is the entry point for any debugging tool using the XAML Diagnostic APIs.
member.param: The end point name for Visual Diagnostics.
The pid of the process to connect to.
The name of the DLL to be injected in the process.
The COM CLSID of the DLL to be injected in the process.
